name: Frequency - Prior to commencing any activity
Acceptance Criteria - Ensure that all employees and subcontractors are:
– using the correct and complete set of drawings
– all drawings are the latest revision
– Conflicting documents will be referenced to the hierarchy of documents listed in Section 175.03
Reference Documents - Drawings and drawing registers Section 720
Record of conformity - This ITP Signed
1.2 - Implementation of all measures and controls
Frequency - Prior to commencing any activity
Acceptance Criteria - All necessary measures and controls are being implemented, that is: PSP, EMP, TMP, SWMS & WP
Reference Documents - OHSMP, EMP, TMS, SWMS, WP
Record of conformity - This ITP Signed
Frequency - As required, Prior to commencement of relevant work
Acceptance Criteria - Evidence of origin of indigenous provenance plant material
Record of conformity - Records, This ITP signed
Frequency - Prior to any planting for each lot

Acceptance Criteria - Utilise locally stripped topsoils only, Fertilisers shall be suitable for the establishment of plant types, sizes and species specified in the plant schedule and Site created Mulch shall be used where possible - imported mulch must meet requirements of Table 719.071
Record of conformity - This ITP Signed
Frequency - Prior to any planting for each lot
Acceptance Criteria - Plants to be as per planting schedule (drawing 4795): PMA replacement trees to be 45L white peppermint (Eucalyptus Pulchella)
Record of conformity - This ITP Signed
Acceptance Criteria - Soil ripped as per Table720.061;
1. 25m2 of min 400mm deep at 500mm max spacing
2. In disturbed areas; place 150mm topsoil (leave uncompacted)
3. cross rip min 300mm deep at 500mm max spacing
Record of conformity - This ITP Signed
Acceptance Criteria - Holes to be dug to correct size for root ball, Holes in heavy soils prepared to ensure adequate drainage, Holes not left smooth sided in Basalt or Plastic soils
– Planting holes shall be backfilled with friable topsoil, free of debris, rocks and clods greater than 50mm in diameter
– Fertiliser is to be applied to all disturbed surfaces and the contractor shall fertilise advanced trees
– Mulch, no less than 1.5 diameter and 150mm depth, will be applied around all planted trees
Record of conformity - This ITP Signed

Acceptance Criteria - The Contractor shall saturate each plant within 8 hours after planting. Cells and tubes shall be irrigated with a minimum 3 litres of water per plant.  Other container sizes shall be irrigated with a volume of water greater than the container size.
Record of conformity - This ITP Signed

Acceptance Criteria - Where tree planting areas do not achieve the performance requirements detailed in Table 719.092 (below) they shall be replaced annually to achieve 100% of the original specified planting numbers.
PREVIOUS 12 MONTHS RAINFALL - ADVANCED TREES MIN GROW RATE

Acceptance Criteria - The Contractor shall water all plants, including seeded areas, as necessary to ensure continued healthy and vigorous growth from time of planting or seeding. Maintenance of areas mulched shall begin from the first planting
The signature below verifies that this ITP has been completed in accordance with the FH’s Quality system Procedures and verifies lot compliance with specifications.
